name: Aave Grants DAO
description: To provide grants to projects, ideas, and events that benefit Aave and its ecosystem.

name: Balancer Grants
description: Community powered grants to support the development of the Balancer ecosystem

name: Chainlink grant program
description: The Chainlink grant program deploys substantial resources toward the creation of critical developer tooling, the addition of high-quality data, and the launching of key services around the Chainlink Network.

name: Compound Grants Program
description: To provide grants to projects, ideas, and events that benefit Compound and its ecosystem.

name: Connext Ecosystem Grants
description: Foster the development of the Connext ecosystem through targeted resource allocation.

name: Ecosystem Support Program
description: We provide grants and other support to the builders of the Ethereum ecosystem.

name: Filecoin Dev Grants
description: Engaging community members to contribute to the Filecoin protocol, project and ecosystem.

name: Gitcoin Grants
description: Discover and fund extraordinary Public Goods with Quadratic Funding

name: Livepeer
description: The Livepeer Grants Program provides funding to projects, ideas and events that benefit the Livepeer ecosystem.

name: Meta Gamma Delta
description: We fund women-led projects that aim to benefit the development of the decentralized ecosystem.

name: Metacartel Grants
description: We provide grant funding to projects and operational support for early stage DApps

name: PoolGrants
description: The PoolTogether grants committee “Community Led, Community Focused.”

name: Radicle Grants
description: Funding Open Source to Grow Open Source

name: Synthetix Grants Council
description: Funding Synthetix related community & public goods projects

name: The Graph Grants
description: The Graph Grants focuses on funding protocol infrastructure, tooling, dapps and subgraphs, and community building efforts.

name: UNI Grants
description: The UNI Grants Program continues to expand and empower the Uniswap community.

name: VitaDAO
description: We are collectively funding, and advancing longevity research in an open and democratic manner.

name: Data Union DAO Grants
description: Data Union DAO is funding builders to build Data Unions using the Data Union SDKs. Visit dataunions.org for more information.
